info.title: Debug native C++ in python scripts

section.title: Debug native C++ in python scripts
section.simpara: ImGui Bundle provides tooling to help you debug the C++ side, when you encounter a bug that is difficult to diagnose from Python.
It can be used in two steps:

listitem.simpara: Edit the file pybind_native_debug/pybind_native_debug.py. Change its content so that it runs the python code you would like to debug. Make sure it works when you run it as a python script.

Now, debug the C++ project pybind_native_debug_bundle which is defined in the directory pybind_native_debug/. This will run your python code from C++, and you can debug the C++ side (place breakpoints, watch variables, etc).
